sentences.en: As shy Daphne, the girl is always coy of speech in public.
sentences.cn: 这女孩非常羞怯, 在公共场合总是窘得说不出话来.

sentences.en: Coy girls often like to play cat and mouse with Boys.
sentences.cn: 害羞的女孩时常令男孩子捉摸不定.

sentences.en: Don't be coy with me about your past record.
sentences.cn: 把你的履历跟我直说了吧.

sentences.en: Don't be so coy, and I know you'd like to do the job.
sentences.cn: 不要这样忸怩作态, 我知道你 真 的喜欢这份工作.

sentences.en: He moved a little to the side of M'Coy's talking head.
sentences.cn: 他把头略微偏过去一点,好躲开 麦科伊 那张谈兴正浓的脸.

sentences.en: I might have tried to work M'Coy for a pass to Mullingar.
sentences.cn: 我本可以托麦科伊给弄张去穆林加尔的免费车票呢.

sentences.en: I was sickened by the way Carol charmed all the men by turning coy.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔忸怩作态勾引男人的样子让我恶心。

sentences.en: Mr Alexander is not the slightest bit coy about his ambitions.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大先生对自己的抱负毫不隐讳。

sentences.en: She gave a coy smile when he paid her a compliment.
sentences.cn: 他恭维她时,她忸怩作态地笑了笑.

sentences.en: She gave him a coy smile.
She gave me a coy smile.
sentences.cn: 她羞答答地对我笑了笑。

sentences.en: She give a coy smile when he pay her a compliment.
sentences.cn: 他恭维她时,她忸怩作态地笑了一笑.

sentences.en: She is modest without being coy.
The hotel are understandably coy about the incident.
sentences.cn: 酒店对那次事件不愿多说，这可以理解。

sentences.en: The nanopowders of CoY _ ( 0.1 ) Fe _ ( 1.9 ) O _ 4 was prepared by sol - gel self - combustion.
sentences.cn: 采用溶胶 — 凝胶自燃烧法制备了 CoY0.1Fe1.9O4铁氧体纳米粉末.

trans.tran_cn: 腼腆的，忸怩作态的，献媚的
trans.tran_en: A coy person is shy, or pretends to be shy, about love and sex
